title: Smart Virtual Agent doesn't provide intents after a suite upgrade
content:
After you upgrade the suite, Smart Virtual Agent can't provide intents in the response.

Cause

The version of the trained model is too old and isn't compatible with the Natural Language Understanding (NLU) pod of your current tenant.

Solution

  1. Log in to Agent Interface and navigate to Administration > Configuration > Virtual Agent Settings.
  2. Click INTENT in the navigation bar.
  3. Click Train to retrain the intents.
